EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners (1378743038.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners (1378743038.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Joe, So nice to meet you via email and thank you David for the referral! I wanted to follow up on the email below and introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. I’ll be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services and answer any specific questions you may have. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCa1BYuE5W6POUIaj%2Bi3vOf4zC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCa1BYuE5W6POUIaj%2Bi3vOf4zC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: David E. Craig [mailto:davidcr@kryl.com] Sent: Friday, September 06, 2013 11:26 PM To: Joe Giunta; Sara Conde Subject: MBO Partners Hi Sara! Joe is a friend of mine that has his own consulting company, but is interested in how MBO might be able to help him with options such as being a contract agent on just those contracts he chooses, contract indemnity/coverage and your preferred partner status with major corporations. I have explained what I recall from our conversations on this matter, but wanted to put the two of you in touch so he can hear it directly from you. J Thanks! public Consultant David_E_Craig(){ /************************************** * Kryl Solutions, LLC (www.kryl.com <www.kryl.com>) * * Architect.Developer.Consultant * * Microsoft.Office.Windows.Phone * **************************************/ contact[linkedin] = "www.linkedin.com/in/davidcr <www.linkedin.com/in/davidcr>"; contact[email] = "davidcr@kryl.com <davidcr@kryl.com>"; contact[blog] = "davecra.wordpress.com <davecra.wordpress.com>"; contact[twitter] = "@davecra <https://twitter.com/davecra>"; contact[work] = "903.224.KRYL";}
